definition: dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: I wish to have harsh words with our friend here. I'll come get you when I'm done.
sentences.chinese: 我得跟我們的這位朋友說些重話，說完了我就去找你。

sentences.english: When offering helpful advice , it's good idea to make it a small helping .
sentences.chinese: 當給別人有益的建議時，重話輕說是個好主意。
